attributes.action: To stop illegal migrant coming to the uk
attributes.additional_details: With the record number of illegal migrants coming into the country by boat, lorries etc the government and party's need to combat  this with there owe money so we the taxpayers knows something is going to sort the problem. If they have to fund the problem thereself they might do what they promise and to stop illegal migrants and STOP GIVE TAX MONEY AWAY FREE. No money for anyone coming into the country without paying taxes for a minimum of 5 years
attributes.background: I want the government, party's, mp and PM to be be accountable for the illegal migrants and to paid out of there owe pocket to fund the people and there benefits I don't want mine or other taxpayer  going to these people. The government should be accountable for not sorting the problem out.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
